name: STARDRAKE OF GRAVITIC COILS
text: Once per turn, if your opponent controls a monster with 3000 or more ATK, and it is the highest ATK on the field, you can Xyz Summon "Stardrake of Gravitic Coils" by using 1 monster you control with the lowest ATK or DEF (your choice, if tied) as material. Cannot be used as Xyz or Link Material. While this Xyz Summoned card is on the field, your opponent cannot target other monsters for attacks. If this card battles an opponent's monster, during damage calculation only, this card’s ATK becomes equal to the ATK of the opponent's battling monster +100.

name: REACTOR SHOCKER
text: Neither player can activate cards or effects in response to this card's activation. When your opponent activates an effect and you have a card effect in the same Chain: You can negate all other activated effects in this Chain, then, if the number of your effects in this Chain is equal to or greater than your opponent’s, draw cards equal to that number, then, if one of your effects is Chain Link 1, place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Reactor Shocker" once per turn.

name: THE CONDESCENDER
text: (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand to the GY, then target 1 face-up monster on the field; declare a number from 1 to 3, then reduce that monster's Level, Rank, or Link Rating by the declared number until the end of the next turn. If a monster whose Level, Rank, or Link Rating is lower than its original value is on the field: You can Special Summon this card from your GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use 1 effect of "The Condescender" per turn and only once that turn.

name: STAINED BIRD BRIA
text: If this card is in your hand: You can discard 1 card; shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck, also, add 1 "Stain" card from your Deck to your hand, then, if your opponent controls more cards than you, draw 1 card. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 card in either GY or banishment; place it on the bottom of the Deck, or, if it is your "Stain" card, add it to the hand instead, and if you do, shuffle this card into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Stained Bird Bria" once per turn.

name: STAINED DEER DANTE
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it, and if you do, shuffle this card into the Deck. If this card is in your GY: You can show 1 face-up "Stain" card in your opponent's Deck or in your field, and if you do, shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck, also, add 1 "Stain" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Stained Deer Dante" once per turn.

name: STAINED FOX FENESS
text: If your opponent controls more cards than you do: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 other face-up card on the field; negate its effects until the end of this turn, and if you do, shuffle this card into the Deck. You can send 1 Level 4 or lower "Stain" monster from your Deck to the GY; Shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck. You can only use each effect of "Stained Fox Feness" once per turn.

name: STAINED RAPTOR ROLLO
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 "Stain" monster in your GY or 1 monster in your opponent's GY; Special Summon it to your field, and if you do, shuffle this card into the Deck. When an attack is declared involving this card and an opponent's monster: You can shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck, also, after that, place that opponent's monster on top of the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Stained Raptor Rollo" once per turn.

name: STAINED SOLITAIRE
text: You can reveal 1 "Stain" Fusion Monster in your Extra Deck; shuffle 1 "Stain" monster from your Deck face-up into your opponent's Deck, also, Special Summon this card from your hand. During your Main Phase: You can shuffle 1 "Stain" monster you control that mentions "Shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck" in its text face-up into your opponent's Deck, also, add 1 "Stain" card from your Deck, GY, or banishment to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Stained Solitaire" once per turn.

name: STARGAZER OF THE STAINED
text: If a card(s) leaves your opponent's Deck, except during the Draw Phase: You can Tribute this card from your hand or field; add 1 "Stain" card from your Deck to your hand. If your opponent controls a card: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Stain" monster that mentions "Shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck" in its text from face-up in your opponent's Deck. You can only use each effect of "Stargazer of the Stained" once per turn.

name: STAINED SCIONESS SILIA
text: During your Main Phase, if this card is in your hand (Quick Effect): You can Fusion Summon 1 "Stain" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck using "Stain" monsters that mention "Shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck" from your hand or field as material. If this card is sent to the GY: You can discard 1 card and send 1 "Stain" card from your Deck to the GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Stained Scioness Silia" once per turn.

name: STAINED SOVEREIGN SILAS
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add to your hand or Set 1 "Stain" card from your Deck. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; while it is face-up on the field, neither player can activate its effects. If your opponent activates a card or effect, and this card is in your GY: You can shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck, also, Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Stain" monster from your GY. You can only use each effect of "Stained Sovereign Silas" once per turn.

name: STAINED SILHOUETTE
text:
If a card(s) leaves your opponent's Deck, except during the Draw Phase: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, but shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck when it leaves the field. If your opponent controls a card (Quick Effect): You can reveal 1 "Stain" card in your hand, then activate 1 of these effects;
● Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Stain" monster from your Deck or GY.
● Until the End Phase, this card's name becomes the original name of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, and it gains that monster's original effects.
You can only use each effect of "Stained Silhouette" once per turn.

name: ABSTAIN FROM LIGHT
text: Fusion Summon 1 "Stain" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck using "Stain" monsters from your hand or field as material, also, for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot activate "Abstain from Light", or Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "Stain" monsters. If your "Stain" monster was shuffled into either Deck this turn, you can also banish "Stain" monsters from face-up in your opponent's Deck as material, but return them to the GY during the End Phase.

name: SHATTERING SUSTAINED
text: Tribute 1 "Stain" monster from your hand, face-up field, or face-up in your opponent's Deck; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Stain" monster from your hand, Deck, or GY, but shuffle it face-up into your opponent's Deck when it leaves the field, then you can Tribute 1 face-up "Stain" monster in your opponent's Deck. During your End Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can banish 1 "Stain" monster from your GY; Set this card. You can only use each effect of "Shattering Sustained" once per turn.

name: STAINED AVATAR
text: 2 "Stain" monsters with different Attributes\nIf a card(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish 1 face-up "Stain" monster in your opponent's Deck instead. If this card is Fusion Summoned by the effect of "Abstain from Light": You can destroy 1 other card on the field. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Stain" Spell/Trap in your GY; apply that card's activation effect. You can only use each effect of "Stained Avatar" once per turn.

name: STAINED SORCERESS SILPHIA
text:
2 "Stain" monsters with different names
During your turn, "Stain" monsters you control gain 600 ATK. You can only control 1 "Stained Sorceress Silphia". If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can activate this effect; shuffle 1 "Stain" monster from your Deck face-up into your opponent's Deck during the Standby Phase of the next turn. Once per Chain, when your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can activate 1 of these effects.
●This card gains 300 ATK.
●This card loses exactly 2000 ATK, and if it does, banish 1 monster on the field and 1 "Stain" monster you control until the End Phase.

name: DISTAINED DRUID DRAGAR
text: 1 "Stain" monster + 1 non-LIGHT "Stain" monster\nIf this card is Special Summoned, or if a non-LIGHT "Stain" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to your field: You can Tribute 1 monster from your field or face-up in your opponent's Deck, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; gain LP equal to that monster's ATK, also, change all other face-up monsters they control to face-down Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Distained Druid Dragar" once per turn.

name: STAINLESS KALEIDRAGON
text: "Stargazer of the Stained" + 2 "Stain" monsters\nWhen a monster(s) would be Special Summoned, or a card or effect is activated that includes an effect that Special Summons a monster(s) (Quick Effect): You can negate that Summon or effect, and if you do, destroy that card(s). You cannot activate cards or effects the turn you activate this effect, except "Stain" cards or effects. If this card is Special Summoned, or if another "Stain" monster(s) is Special Summoned to your field: You can look at your opponent's hand and all face-down cards they control. You can only use each effect of "Stainless Kaleidragon" once per turn.

name: AETHERSTORM ZENITH WIRE-TAILED SYPHARION
text: 2+ Level 9 monsters\nYou can also Xyz Summon this card by using 1 Rank 8 Dragon Xyz Monster you control as material. (Transfer its materials to this card.) You cannot Special Summon monsters, except LIGHT or DARK Dragon monsters, the turn you Xyz Summon this card. This card cannot be targeted by card effects. When a card or effect is activated that targets a monster you control (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, and target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy that target. During the End Phase: You can target 1 Dragon Monster you control; attach that target to this card as material. You can only use each effect of "Aetherstorm Zenith Wire-Tailed Sypharion" once per turn.

name: ARMORED NOVA MECHA-SCALED XYRION
text: 2+ Level 9 Monsters\nYou can also Xyz Summon this card by using 1 Rank 8 Dragon Xyz Monster you control as material. (Transfer its materials to this card.) You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn this card is Xyz Summoned, except LIGHT or DARK Dragon Monsters. Once per turn, when a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; negate the activation. During the End Phase, if this Xyz Summoned card has no materials: You can destroy it, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Rank 8 Dragon Xyz Monster from your GY, but negate its effects, also its ATK/DEF become 0. You can only use each effect of "Armored Nova Mecha-Scaled Xyrion" once per turn.

name: SOLEMN REBIRTH
text: You can banish this card from your field or GY; Set all Spell/Trap Cards that were destroyed by your opponent's card effects this turn from your GY to your Spell & Trap Zone.

name: TALISMANDRAKE SPARK
text: Pendulum Effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except Pyro Monsters. If you Fusion Summon a Pyro Fusion Monster: You can inflict 500 damage to your opponent. You can only use this effect of "Talismandrake Spark" once per turn.\nMonster Effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Talismandrake" monster from your Deck or face-up Extra Deck to your hand, except "Talismandrake Spark". If a DARK Pyro Fusion Monster is Fusion Summoned to your field: You can place this card from your face-up Extra Deck in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Talismandrake Spark" once per turn.

name: TALISMANDRAKE EMBERS
text: Pendulum Effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except Pyro Monsters. You can target 1 "Talismandrake" Fusion Monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but return it to the Extra Deck when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Talismandrake Embers" once per turn.\nMonster Effect: If this card is Summoned while you control another "Talismandrake" monster, except "Talismandrake Embers": You can draw 1 card. If a DARK Pyro Fusion monster is Fusion Summoned to your field: You can place this card from your face-up Extra Deck in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Talismandrake Embers" once per turn.

name: TALISMANDRAKE HEAT
text: Pendulum Effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except Pyro Monsters. You can target 1 DARK Pyro Fusion Monster in your GY; return it to the Extra Deck, and if you do, return this card to the hand. You can only use this effect of “Talismandrake Heat” once per turn.\nMonster Effect: Gains 200 ATK for each “Talismandrake” Spell/Trap you control that is equipped to a monster. If you control a DARK Pyro monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. During the Main Phase: You can Fusion Summon 1 DARK Pyro Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as material. You can only use each effect of "Talismandrake Heat" once per turn.

name: TALISMANDRAKE SEAR
text: Pendulum Effect: During your Main Phase, or if your opponent activates a card or effect: You can Fusion Summon 1 "Talismandrake" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from you control or in your Pendulum Zone as material. You can only use this effect of "Talismandrake Sear" once per turn.\nMonster Effect: If this card is used as material for the Fusion Summon of a "Talismandrake" monster: You can Special Summon 1 "Talismandrake" monster from your Pendulum Zone, also, you can place 1 "Talismandrake" Pendulum Monster from your face-up Extra Deck in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use this effect of "Talismandrake Sear" once per turn.

name: TALISMANDRAKE ARMS UNITED
text: Discard 1 card; place up to 2 "Talismandrake" Pendulum Monsters from your Deck or face-up Extra Deck in your Pendulum Zones. If a Pyro Fusion Monster is Special Summoned to your field (except during the Damage Step): You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 of those monsters; equip 1 "Talismandrake Arms" Spell/Trap from your Deck to it as if it were equipped by that Spell/Trap's effect. You can only use each effect of "Talismandrake Arms United" once per turn.

name: LEFT TALISMANDRAKE ARMS - BLAZE SUPPRESSOR
text: If you control a "Talismandrake" monster: Target 1 face-up card on the field; destroy it. During your Main Phase, or if your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 DARK Pyro monster you control; equip this card from your GY to it as an Equip Spell with the following effect.\n● The equipped monster gains 500 ATK, also, your opponent cannot target it with card effects.\nYou can only use 1 "Left Talismandrake Arms - Blaze Suppressor" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

name: RIGHT TALISMANDRAKE ARMS - BLAZE HALBERD
text: If you control a "Talismandrake" monster: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; change it to face-down Defense Position. During your Main Phase, or if your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 DARK Pyro monster you control; equip this card from your GY to it as an Equip Spell with the following effect.\n● The equipped monster gains 500 ATK, also, if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.\nYou can only use 1 "Right Talismandrake Arms - Blaze Halberd" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

name: RIGHT TALISMANDRAKE ARMS - BLAZE SABRE
text: If you control a "Talismandrake" monster: Target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of this turn. During your Main Phase, or if your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 DARK Pyro monster you control; equip this card from your GY to it as an Equip Spell with the following effects.\n● The equipped monster gains 500 ATK for each Equip Spell equipped to a monster you control, also, if it would be destroyed by battle, you can destroy this card instead.\nYou can only use 1 "Right Talismandrake Arms - Blaze Sabre" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

name: LEFT TALISMANDRAKE ARMS - BLAZE SHIELD
text: Special Summon 1 "Talismandrake" monster from your Deck, GY, or face-up Extra Deck to your Main Monster Zone. During either player's turn: You can target 1 DARK Pyro Fusion Monster you control; equip this card from your GY to it as an Equip Spell with the following effect.\n● The equipped monster gains 500 DEF for each Equip Spell equipped to a monster you control, also, if it would leave the field by your opponent's card effect, you can destroy this card instead.\nYou can only use 1 "Left Talismandrake Arms - Blaze Shield" per turn, and only once that turn.

name: TALISMANDRAKE PYRE
text: 1 DARK Pyro monster + 1 Pyro monster\nIf this card is Special Summoned: You can activate this effect; from your Deck, either add 1 “Talismandrake” card or 1 DARK Pyro monster to your hand, or send 1 "Talismandrake Arms" Spell/Trap to your GY. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Talismandrake" card in your Pendulum Zone; destroy it, then place 1 "Talismandrake" Pendulum Monster with a different name from your hand, Deck, or face-up Extra Deck in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Talismandrake Pyre" once per turn.

name: TALISMANDRAKE CREMATION
text: 1 DARK Pyro monster + 1 Level 5 or higher DARK monster\nIf this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Talismandrake Arms" Spell/Trap from your Deck or GY to your hand, or equip it to a DARK Pyro monster you control as if it were equipped by that Spell/Trap's effect. If you control a monster equipped with a "Talismandrake Arms" card (Quick Effect): You can shuffle up to 3 cards from either player's GY or banishment into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Talismandrake Cremation" once per turn.

name: TALISMANDRAKE ENKINDLE
text: 1 "Talismandrake" monster + 1 DARK Pyro monster\nIf this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Talismandrake Arms" Spell/Trap from your Deck or GY to your hand, or equip it to a DARK Pyro monster you control as if it were equipped by that Spell/Trap's effect. When your opponent activates a card or effect while you control a monster equipped with a "Talismandrake Arms" card (Quick Effect): You can banish that card. You can only use each effect of "Talismandrake Enkindle" once per turn.

name: MAIDEN OF TALISMANDRAKES SERAPHINA
text: Pendulum Effect: You can shuffle 3 "Talismandrake" monsters with different names from your face-up Extra Deck, field, and/or GY into the Deck; Special Summon this card from your Pendulum Zone, then you can equip 1 "Talismandrake Arms" Spell/Trap from your GY to this card as if it was equipped by that Spell/Trap's effect.\nMonster Effect: 2 "Talismandrake" monsters + 1 Pyro Pendulum Monster\nIf this card is Fusion Summoned, or if your opponent activates a card or effect: You can target 1 "Talismandrake Arms" Spell/Trap in your GY; add it to your hand or equip it to this card as if it were equipped by that Spell/Trap's effect. If this card in the Monster Zone leaves the field: You can place it in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use the previous effects of “Maiden of Talismandrakes, Seraphina” once per turn. If a "Right Talismandrake Arms" and "Left Talismandrake Arms" Spell/Trap is equipped to this card (Quick Effect): You can pay 1000 LP; destroy all cards your opponent controls, also, you cannot use this effect of "Maiden of Talismandrakes, Seraphina" until the end of the next turn.

name: BISHOP OF ALDREZ
text: Xyz and Link Monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. You can only use the following effects of "Bishop of Aldrez" once per turn. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Aldrez" Spell/Trap from your Deck or GY to your hand. If an Xyz Monster is Special Summoned while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, draw 1 card.

name: PAWN OF ALDREZ
text: If you control an "Aldrez" card, except "Pawn of Aldrez", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Pawn of Aldrez" once per turn this way. You can only use the following effects of "Pawn of Aldrez" once per turn. If this card is Normal Summoned: You can draw 1 card. If this card is used as material for a Link Summon: You can Special Summon this card, but shuffle it into the Deck when it leaves the field.

name: QUEEN OF ALDREZ
text: If you control a "Aldrez" monster other than "Queen of Aldrez", your opponent's monsters cannot target this card for attacks, also your opponent cannot target other "Aldrez" monsters you control with card effects. You can only use the following effects of "Queen of Aldrez" once per turn. If you control a "Aldrez" monster, except "Queen of Aldrez": You can Special Summon this card from your hand. During your Main Phase: You can add 1 "Aldrez" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Queen of Aldrez".

name: ALDREZ BATTERY
text: Add 1 "Aldrez" monster from your Deck to your hand, also, you cannot declare attacks for the rest of this turn, except with "Aldrez" monsters. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 monsters your opponent controls; its ATK becomes 0, and if it does, you can have 1 "Aldrez" monster you control gain that lost ATK. You can only activate 1 "Aldrez Battery" per turn.

name: ALDREZ BLITZ
text: Target 1 Level 4 or lower "Aldrez" monster in your GY or banishment; Special Summon it, then, if you Summoned a Level 4 monster, you can Special Summon 1 "Aldrez Token" (Spellcaster/DARK/Level 4/ATK 1000/DEF 1000). If you Xyz Summon an "Aldrez" Xyz Monster while this card is in the GY: You can Set this card. You can only use each effect of "Aldrez Blitz" once per turn.

name: ALDREZ OPENING
text: "Aldrez" monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF. Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects when you Normal or Special Summon a "Aldrez" monster(s). You can target up to 3 "Aldrez" cards in your GY or banishment; shuffle them into the Deck, and if you do, you can draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Aldrez Opening" once per turn.

name: CHECKED IN ALDREZ
text: If your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) while you control an "Aldrez" monster: Send 1 "Aldrez" monster from your Deck to the GY; send 1 monster your opponent controls to the GY. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Aldrez" card in your GY or banishment, except "Checked in Aldrez"; add it to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Checked in Aldrez" per turn.

name: CHECKMATE IN ALDREZ
text: If you control an "Aldrez" monster: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; negate its effects, then, if you control the monster with the highest ATK on the field, you can destroy all monsters your opponent controls, except that target. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Aldrez" monster in your GY or banishment; Special Summon it. If you control an "Aldrez" Xyz Monster, you can activate this card from your hand. You can only activate 1 "Checkmate in Aldrez" per turn.

name: KNIGHT OF ALDREZ
text: 2 monsters, including an "Aldrez" monster\nYou can treat this card as a Level 4 monster when you Xyz Summon a Rank 4 Xyz Monster. You can only use the following effects of "Knight of Aldrez" once per turn. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 card; take 1 "Aldrez" card from your Deck, and either add it to your hand, or if it is a monster, you can Special Summon it. If an "Aldrez" Xyz Monster is sent to the GY by an opponent's card: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon that monster, then you can attach 1 card from either GY to it.

name: ROOK OF ALDREZ
text: 2 monsters, including a "Aldrez" monster\nYou can treat this card as a Level 4 monster when you Xyz Summon a Rank 4 Xyz Monster. You can only use the following effects of "Rook of Aldrez" once per turn. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can take 1 "Aldrez" card from your GY, add it to your hand, or if it's a monster, you can Special Summon it. If an "Aldrez" Xyz Monster is sent to the GY by an opponents card: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon that monster, then you can attach 1 card from either field to it.

name: KING OF ALDREZ
text: 2+ Level 4 "Aldrez" monsters\nYou can only control 1 "King of Aldrez". Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; Special Summon 1 "Aldrez" monster from your hand or GY, then if you detached a Link Monster to activate this effect, you can destroy 1 card on the field. You can only use the following effects of "King of Aldrez" once per turn. If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can add 1 "Aldrez" Trap from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Aldrez" Link Monster from your banishment.

name: THE BLUE FRUTE
text: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Frute" monster from your Deck in face-down Defense Position, except "The Blue Frute". If this card is Tributed: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; this turn, its ATK/DEF becomes 0, also if this card was Tributed in face-down Defense Position, banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "The Blue Frute" once per turn.

name: THE YELLOW FRUTE
text: You can send this card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Frute" monster from your hand or GY in face-up or face-down Defense Position, except "The Yellow Frute". If this card is Tributed: You can draw 1 card, or, if this card was Tributed in face-down Defense Position, you can draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card. You can only use each effect of "The Yellow Frute" once per turn.

name: THE RED FRUTE
text: If you control no face-up monsters, or you control a "Frute" card: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can send 1 "Frute" card from your Deck to the GY, with a different name from the cards you control. If this card is Tributed: You can add 1 "Fruteonia" from your Deck to your hand, or, if this card was Tributed in face-down Defense Position, you can Set 1 "Frute" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck instead. You can only use each effect of "The Red Frute" once per turn.

name: THE GREEN FRUTE
text: You can Tribute 1 WATER monster from your hand or field, except “The Green Frute”; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY in face-down Defense Position, but banish it when it leaves the field. If this card is Tributed: You can send 1 “Frute” monster from your Deck to the GY, except “The Green Frute”, or, if this card was Tributed in face-down Defense Position, you can send 1 “Frute” Spell/Trap from your Deck to the GY instead. You can only use each effect of "The Green Frute" once per turn.

name: THE WHITE FRUTE
text: You can Tribute 1 WATER monster; Special Summon this card from your hand, then add 1 "Frute" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "The White Frute". If this card is Tributed: You can target 1 "Frute" monster in your GY, except "The White Frute"; add it to your hand, or, if this card was Tributed in face-down Defense Position, you can Special Summon it in face-up or face-down Defense Position instead. You can only use each effect of "The White Frute" once per turn.

name: FRUTEONIA
text: While you control a WATER Ritual Monster, your opponent cannot target face-down monsters you control with attacks or card effects. You can only use each of the following effects of "Fruteonia" once per turn. You can Tribute 1 WATER monster from your hand or field; add 1 WATER Ritual Monster or 1 "Fruteification" from your Deck, GY, or banishment to your hand. If a monster(s) on the field is Tributed: You can target 1 "Frute" card in your banishment; return it to the GY.

name: FRUTEOPIA
text: This card’s name becomes “Fruteonia” while face-up on the field. You can only use 1 of the following effects of “Fruteopia” per turn, and only once that turn. When this card is activated: You can add 1 “Frute” monster or 1 “Fruteification” from your Deck or banishment to your hand. If a WATER Ritual Monster(s) you control leaves the field by card effect: You can send this card to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 of those monsters. ● Set a card(s) from the hand, Deck or GY.
You can only use this effect of "Frozen Girl & Blood Moon" once per turn.

name: Ghost Doll & Midnight Manor
text:
When a card or effect is activated that includes any of these effects (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; negate that activation.
● Add a banished card(s) to the hand, Deck, and/or Extra Deck.
● Special Summon a banished Monster Card(s).
● Banish a card(s) from the Deck.
You can only use this effect of "Ghost Doll & Midnight Manor" once per turn.

name: Dominus Sentinel
text: If your opponent controls a card, you can activate this card from your hand. When a card or effect is activated that targets a card(s) you own: Negate that effect, then, if you have a Trap in your GY, destroy that card. If you activated this card from your hand, you cannot activate the effects of NATURE, ELECTRIC, METAL and ICE monsters for the rest of this Duel. You can only activate 1 "Dominus Sentinel" per turn.

name: Clock of Aldrez
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Aldrez" card from your Deck to your GY. When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or effect while this card is in your hand or face-up on your field (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; the activated effect becomes "Send 1 face-up Xyz Monster your opponent controls to the GY", then Special Summon this card from your GY to your opponent's field (with its effects negated), also, you cannot activate monster effects on the field until the end of this turn, except "Aldrez" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Clock of Aldrez" once per turn.

name: Aldrez Grandmaster
text: When an "Aldrez" monster battles, your opponent cannot activate Spell/Trap Cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step. During your Main Phase: You can reveal 1 "Aldrez" monster in your hand or target 1 "Aldrez" monster you control; Special Summon 1 "Aldrez" monster with a different name from your hand or banishment, with the same Type (Link or non-Link). You can only use this effect of "Aldrez Grandmaster" once per turn.

name: Phantasm Spiral Resurgence
text: Equip only to a non-Effect monster. If the equipped monster battles your opponent's monster: Halve that monster's ATK and DEF, also, negate its effect until the end of this turn (including in the GY). When the equipped monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can add 1 "Phantasm Spiral" card from your GY to your hand.

name: Phantasm Spiral Shrine
text: Place 1 "Umi" from your Deck or GY face-up on your field, it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects while you control no Effect Monsters. You can banish this card from your GY, then target up to 5 "Phantasm Spiral" Spell/Trap Cards and/or Normal Monsters in your GY; shuffle them into the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only activate 1 "Phantasm Spiral Shrine" effect per turn and only once that turn.

name: Phantasm Spiral Ensnarement
text: If all monsters you control are Normal Monsters: Change 1 face-up monster on the field to face-down Defense Position. If "Umi" is on the field, you can activate this card from your hand. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Normal Monster you control; equip 1 "Phantasm Spiral" Equip Spell from your Deck to that monster. You can only use this effect of "Phantasm Spiral Ensnarement" once per turn.

name: Grand Puppet of Wicked Puppeteer
text: During the Main Phase, if you control "Wicked Puppeteer Orchis" (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 monster you control; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. If this card is Summoned while you control a Ritual Monster: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Grand Puppet of Wicked Puppeteer" once per turn.

name: Knight Puppet of Wicked Puppeteer
text: During the Main Phase, if you control "Wicked Puppeteer Orchis" (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 monster you control; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. If this card is Summoned while you control a Ritual Monster: Monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Knight Puppet of Wicked Puppeteer" once per turn.

name: Minion Puppets of Wicked Puppeteer
text: During the Main Phase, if you control "Wicked Puppeteer Orchis" (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 monster you control; Special Summon this card from hand or GY. If this card is Tributed while you control "Wicked Puppeteer Orchis": You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Minion Puppets of Wicked Puppeteer" once per turn.

name: Guardian of Wicked Puppeteer
text: You can discard this card; send 1 "Wicked Puppeteer" card from your Deck to the GY. You can banish this card from your GY; Ritual Summon 1 "Wicked Puppeteer Orchis" from your hand or GY by Tributing monsters from your hand and/or field whose total Levels equal or exceed 4. You can only use each effect of "Guardian of Wicked Puppeteer" once per turn.

name: The True Wicked Puppeteer, Orchis
text: This card is treated as "Wicked Puppeteer Orchis" and a Ritual monster while on the field. If this card is Normal Summoned: You can discard 1 card; add 1 "Wicked Puppeteer Orchis" and 1 "Wicked Puppeteer Tragedy" from your Deck, GY, or banishment to your hand. If a monster whose original name is "Wicked Puppeteer Orchis" you control leaves the field because of your opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon this card from your GY, then you can Special Summon 1 "Puppet Token" (DARK/Warrior/Level 4/ATK 1500/DEF 200). You can only use each effect of "The True Wicked Puppeteer, Orchis" once per turn.

name: Wicked Puppeteer, Orchis
text: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Wicked Puppeteer Tragedy". If you control another monster, this card cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects. Once per turn: You can banish 3 or 6 cards from your Extra Deck face-down; Special Summon 1 "Puppet Token" (DARK/Warrior/Level 4/ATK 1500/DEF 200) in Defense Position for every 3 cards banished. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 monster you control, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it until the end of this turn.

name: Wicked Puppeteer Tragedy
text: Ritual Summon 1 "Wicked Puppeteer Orchis" from your hand or GY, by Tributing monsters from your hand and/or field whose total Levels equal or exceed 4. If this card is in the GY: You can banish this card; send 1 "Wicked Puppeteer" monster from your Deck to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Wicked Puppeteer Tragedy" once per turn.

name: Wicked Puppeteery
text: When this card activated: You can add 1 "Wicked Puppeteer" monster from your Deck to your hand. If a "Wicked Puppeteer" monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or your opponent's card effect, while you control a Ritual Monster, you can banish 1 card from your Extra Deck face-down instead. If "Wicked Puppeteer Orchis" leaves the field because of your opponent's card effect: You can add 1 "Wicked Puppeteer Tragedy" and 1 "Wicked Puppeteer" monster from your Deck to the hand. You can only use each effect of "Wicked Puppeteery" once per turn.

name: Divine Phoenix of Nephthys
text: (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Nephthys" monster you control; destroy it, then Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, you can destroy 1 card on the field. Once per turn, during your next Standby Phase after this card was destroyed by card effect and sent to the GY: Special Summon this card from your GY, then you can Ritual Summon 1 "Nephthys" monster from your Deck by Tributing this card you control. You can only use each effect of "Divine Phoenix of Nephthys" once per turn.

name: Primite Dragon Citrine
text: A primordial dragon made of gems. Solid as a rock and resistant as a jewel. Its power comes straight from the minerals it absorbs to rebuild its body.

name: Pedicaes Papa
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Bear Trap" or 1 "Mine" Field Spell from your Deck to your hand. If your "Vir Pedicae Mortis" monster battles: You can send 1 "Recollection" Spell that mentions "Vir Pedicae Mortis" in its text from your Deck to the GY; that monster gains 500 ATK. You can only use each effect of "Pedicae's Papa" once per turn.

name: Vir Pedicae Mortis - Entity's Happy Servant
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can discard 1 card or send 1 "Recollection" card you control to the GY; add 1 "Recollection" card and 1 "Bear Trap" or 1 "Mortis" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Vir Pedicae Mortis - Entity's Happy Servant" once per turn. While you control "Pedicae's Papa", "Recollection" cards and "Mine" Field Spells you control cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.

name: Vir Pedicae Mortis - Fearless Hunter
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use this effect of "Vir Pedicae Mortis - Fearless Hunter" once per turn. This card can be treated as 2 materials, when you Link Summon a "Vir Pedicae Mortis" monster.

name: Vir Pedicae Mortis - The Unhallowed Warden
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Tribute 1 other monster you control; shuffle 1 monster your opponent controls into the Deck. If this card is used as material for the Link Summon of a "Vir Pedicae Mortis" monster, and sent to the GY or banished: You can Tribute 1 monster you control; Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Vir Pedicae Mortis - The Unhallowed Warden" once per turn.

name: Vir Pedicae Mortis - True Nightmare
text:
2+ monsters, including a "Vir Pedicae Mortis" monster
If this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 "Vir Pedicae Mortis" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. If you activated a "Bear Trap" this turn (Quick Effect): You can target up to 2 cards your opponent controls; destroy them. You can only use each effect of "Vir Pedicae Mortis - True Nightmare" once per turn.

name: Entity's Realm - Pedicae Estate
text: When this card is activated: Add 1 "Vir Pedicae Mortis" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand. Once per turn: You can target 1 "Vir Pedicae Mortis" monster or "Pedicae's Papa" you control; double its ATK, also it can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each this turn. If a "Vir Pedicae Mortis" monster you control destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can banish 1 card from your opponent's GY. You can only activate this effect of "Entity's Realm - Pedicae Estate" once per turn. You can only activate 1 "Entity's Realm - Pedicae Estate" once per turn.

name: Recollection: Static, Lead, and Nerve
text: Add 1 "Vir Pedicae Mortis" monster from your Deck to your hand, then discard 1 card. You can only activate 1 "Recollection: Static, Lead and Nerve" per turn.

name: Recollection: A Lesson in Iron
text: Pay 1000 LP, then target 1 "Vir Pedicae Mortis" monster you control; it gains 500 ATK, also it cannot be destroyed or targeted by card effects this turn. You can only activate 1 "Recollection: A Lesson in Iron" per turn.

name: Recollection: The Mine
text: All monsters your opponent controls lose 500 ATK for each "Vir Pedicae Mortis" monster you control. Once per turn: You can banish 1 card from your GY, then discard 1 card; Special Summon 1 "Predicae's Papa" or 1 "Vir Pedicae Mortis" monster from your Deck, then add 1 "Recollection: Kaboom Papa" from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Recollection: The Mine" per turn.

name: Recollection: Kaboom Papa
text: Destroy 1 "Mine" Field Spell and 1 "Pedicae's Papa" you control, and if you do, destroy all cards on the field. You can only conduct 1 Summon this turn. You can only activate 1 "Recollection: Kaboom Papa" per turn.

name: Teleum Mortis
text: Equip only to a "Vir Pedicae Mortis" monster. A monster equiped with this card gains 500 ATK for each "Bear Trap" activated this Duel. If the equipped monster would be destroyed, destroy this card instead.

name: Bear Trap
text: When your opponent would Summon a monster, or declares an attack: Negate the Summon or attack, and if you do, destroy that monster. If you control a "Vir Pedicae Mortis" monster and this card is in your GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only activate 1 "Bear Trap" per turn

name: Securitake Agent
text:
1 monster your opponent owns
You can only Link Summon "Securitake Agent" once per turn. If this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 monster in your opponent's GY that was sent there this turn; Special Summon it to your field, but negate its effects.

name: Harmony Pearlwood & the Nautical Deepwaters
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. If your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can add 1 Level 1 Aqua monster from your Deck to your hand except "Harmony Pearlwood & the Nautical Deepwaters", but that monster cannot activate its effects this turn. You can only use this effect of "Harmony Pearlwood & the Nautical Deepwaters" once per turn.

name: Melody Merheart & the Nautical Coral Reef
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. If your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can add 1 "Nautica" card from your GY to your hand, except "Melody Merheart & the Nautical Coral Reef". You can only use this effect "Melody Merheart & the Nautical Coral Reef" once per turn.

name: Emma Oceannus & the Nautical Coastlines
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. If your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then, immediately after this effect resolves, you can Xyz Summon 1 "Nautica" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck using monsters you control as material.

name: Bobbie Bluefin & the Nautical Nocturnes
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. If your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then, immediately after this effect resolves, your opponent Normal or Special Summons 1 monster from their hand in Attack Position, but its ATK becomes 0, and if you do, if all monsters you control are "Nautica" monsters, negate its effects. You can only use this effect of "Bobbie Bluefin & the Nautical Nocturnes" once per turn.

name: Scarlet Seareef & the Nautical Creatures
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by placing 2 Aqua Monsters from your GY on the bottom of your Deck in any order. You can treat this card as a Level 1 monster when you Xyz Summon an Aqua monster. You can discard 1 card; shuffle this card from your hand into the Deck, then add 1 "Exploring the Nautical Waters" from your Deck to your hand. If this card is Special Summoned: You can draw 1 card, then, immediately after this effect resolves, your opponent Normal or Special Summons 1 monster from their hand in Attack Position, but its ATK becomes 0.

name: Evander Coldwater & the Nautical Abyss
text:
2+ Level 1 Aqua monsters
Gains 500 ATK for each "Nautica" card attached to it as Xyz Material. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; return it to the hand, then, immediately after this effect resolves, your opponent Normal or Special Summons 1 monster from their hand in Attack Position, but its ATK becomes 0.

name: Nautical Backwashing & Oceanic Waves
text: Target 1 "Nautica" monster in your GY; return that target to the hand, then, immediately after this effect resolves, your opponent Normal or Special Summons 1 monster from their hand in Attack Position, but its ATK becomes 0. You can banish this card from your GY; place 3 Aqua monsters from your GY on the bottom of your Deck in any order, then draw 1 card. You can only use 1 effect of "Nautical Backwashing & Oceanic Waves" per turn and only once that turn.

name: Melissa Oceanheart & the Nautical Seabed
text:
2+ Level 1 Aqua monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects while it has a "Nautica" card as Xyz Material. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 2 materials from this card; Set 1 "Nautica" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck, or add 1 "Nautica" monster from your Deck to your hand.

name: Exploring the Nautical Waters
text: Add 1 "Nautica" monster from your Deck to your hand, then, immediately after this effect resolves, your opponent Normal or Special Summons 1 monster from their hand or Deck in Attack Position, but its ATK becomes 0, then, if that monster was Special Summoned from the Deck this way, negate its effects. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you use this effect, except WATER Monsters. You can only activate 1 "Exploring the Nautical Waters" per turn.

name: Nautical Adventures & Torrential Seas
text: Target 1 "Nautica" monster you control and 1 monster your opponent controls; return those targets to the hand, then, immediately after this effect resolves, your opponent Normal or Special Summons 1 monster from their hand in Attack Position, but its ATK is becomes 0. If your WATER Monster is Xyz Summoned while this card is in the GY: You can attach this card to it as Xyz material, but banish this card when detached. You can only use each effect of "Nautical Adventures & Torrential Seas" once per turn.

name: Bob
text: His name is Bob, the turtle. He is not powerful at the moment, but soon, he will absorb Umi's power and become much stronger!

name: Bob, but Stronger!
text:
"Bob" + 1 "Umi"
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by sending the above cards you control to the GY (You do not use "Polymerization".) You can only control 1 "Bob, but Stronger!". Can attack all monsters your opponent controls, once each. Your "Bob" and monsters that mention it can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If they do, apply their DEF for damage calculation. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict double piercing battle damage to your opponent.

name: Bookkeeper of Crying Chaos
text: (Quick effect): You can discard this card, then target 1 Level 3 or lower Zombie monster in your GY; Special Summon it. If you control a Level 6 or higher "Crying Chaos" Synchro Monster: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 Level 3 Zombie monster from your hand or GY. You can only use each effect of "Bookkeeper of Crying Chaos" once per turn.

name: Crow of Crying Chaos
text: "I beg of you, please spare me. I promise anything." These were the last words of the poor soul who now crows in agony.

name: Plague Doctor of Crying Chaos
text: If you control a Level 3 or lower Zombie monster, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. If you control no tuner monsters: You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY; this card is treated as a Tuner until the end of the turn. You can only use each effect of "Plague Doctor of Crying Chaos" once per turn.

name: Scarecrow of Crying Chaos
text: If this card is sent to the GY as Synchro Material: You can send 1 "Crying Chaos" monster from your Deck to the GY. You can banish this card and 2 other Zombie monsters from your GY; Special Summon 1 Link-2 Zombie Link Monster from your Extra Deck (this is treated as a Link Summon). You can only activate 1 effect of "Scarecrow of Crying Chaos" per turn and only once that turn.

name: Slug of Crying Chaos
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 Zombie Tuner monster from your Deck, and if you do, you cannot Special Summon monsters until the end of this turn, except Zombie monsters. If this card is sent to the GY as Synchro Material: You can Special Summon this card from the GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Slug of Crying Chaos" once per turn.

name: Witch of Crying Chaos
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 Zombie monster from your hand to the GY; add 1 "Crying Chaos" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent to the GY as Link or Synchro Material: You can place this card on the bottom of your Deck; draw 1 card. You can only use 1 effect of "Witch of Crying Chaos" per turn and only once that turn.

name: Hunter of Crying Chaos
text: Gains 400 ATK for each Zombie monster you control and in your GY. You can only use the following effect of "Hunter of Crying Chaos" once per turn. If this card is sent to the GY: You can banish this card; add 1 "Crying Chaos" monster from your Deck to your hand or set 1 "Crying Chaos" Spell/Trap from your Deck directly to your field.

name: Guardian of Crying Chaos
text: If you control a "Crying Chaos" monster with 2500 or more ATK, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand or GY). If this card is Special Summoned: You can either increase or decrease this card's Level by 2 until the end of the turn. You can only use this effect of "Guardian of Crying Chaos" once per turn.

name: Goat of Crying Chaos
text:
2 Level 4 or lower Zombie monsters, including a "Crying Chaos" monster
If this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 Level 3 "Crying Chaos" Tuner monster from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Zombie monster from your hand or GY. You can only use each effect of "Goat of Crying Chaos" once per turn.

name: Zenatil, Criminal Bookkeeper of Crying Chaos
text:
2+ Zombie monsters, including a Link Monster
If this card is Link Summoned using a "Crying Chaos" Link Monster: You can shuffle 3 "Crying Chaos" cards from your GY and/or banishment into the Deck. If this card points to a "Crying Chaos" Synchro Monster(s): You can make this card gain ATK equal to half the ATK of a monster it points to until the end of the turn. You can only use each effect of "Zenatil, Criminal Bookkeeper of Crying Chaos" once per turn.

name: Zebra of Crying Chaos
text:
1 Zombie Tuner + 1 non-Tuner monster
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can Target 1 Zombie monster in your GY; Special Summon it. If this card is sent to the GY as a Synchro Material: You can inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each Zombie monster you control and in your GY. You can only use each effect of "Zebra of Crying Chaos" once per turn.

name: Ram of Crying Chaos
text:
1 Zombie Tuner monster + 1 non-Tuner monster
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Zombie monster from your GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can Tribute 1 monster you control; destroy 1 card on the field. You can only use each effect of "Ram of Crying Chaos" once per turn.

name: Natir, The Swords Master of Crying Chaos
text:
1 Zombie Tuner monster + 1 non-Tuner monster
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 Zombie Tuner monster from your Deck or GY. If When your opponent activates a monster effect that targets a card you control or in your GY (Quick Effect): You can shuffle 1 Zombie monster from your banishment into the Deck; negate that effect. You can only use each effect of "Natir, The Swords Master of Crying Chaos" once per turn.

name: Revelation of Crying Chaos
text:
1 Zombie Tuner monster + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned using a Zombie Synchro Monster: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Zombie monster from your Deck or GY. When your opponent activates a card or effect that would make a card you control leave the field (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 "Crying Chaos" monster you control; Negate that effect, and if you do, this card gains ATK equal to the Tributed monster's combined ATK and DEF until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Revelation of Crying Chaos" once per turn.

name: Dragon of Crying Chaos
text:
1 Zombie Tuner monster + 1 "Revelation of Crying Chaos"
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can return all cards your opponent controls to the hand. When your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick effect): You can negate that effect, then shuffle 1 Zombie monster from your GY into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Dragon of Crying Chaos" once per turn.

name: Windborne Swiftsurfer
text: You can also reveal up to 2 "Windborne" Spells in your hand to activate this effect; Special Summon this card from your hand by shuffling up to 2 cards from your hand into the Deck, including "Windborne" Spells you revealed to activate this effect (if any), and if you do, during the next Standby Phase, add a "Windborne" card from your Deck to your hand for each card you shuffled into the Deck by this effect, except "Windborne Swiftsurfer", then Set "Windborne" Quick-Play Spells directly from your Deck for each card you revealed to activate this effect. The Set Quick-Play Spell(s) can be activated that turn. When your opponent activates a monster effect, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 WIND Synchro Monster, using monsters you control as material, including this card. You can only use each effect of "Windborne Swiftsurfer" once per turn.

name: Windborne Cloudwing
text: You can also reveal up to 2 "Windborne" Spells in your hand to activate this effect; Special Summon this card from your hand by shuffling up to 2 cards from your hand into the Deck, including "Windborne" Spells you revealed to activate this effect (if any), and if you do, during the next Standby Phase, add a "Windborne" card from your Deck to your hand for each card you shuffled into the Deck by this effect, except "Windborne Cloudwing", then Set "Windborne" Quick-Play Spells directly from your Deck for each card you revealed to activate this effect. The Set Quick-Play Spell(s) can be activated that turn. When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or effect, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 WIND Synchro Monster, using monsters you control as material, including this card. You can only use each effect of "Windborne Cloudwing" once per turn.

name: A World of Crying Chaos
text: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Crying Chaos" monster from your Deck to your hand. If you Synchro Summon a "Crying Chaos" Synchro Monster: You can target 1 Level 3 or lower Zombie monster in your GY or banishment; Special Summon it, but place it on the bottom of your Deck when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "A World of Crying Chaos" once per turn.

name: Windborne Cartographer
text: If this card you control would be used for the Synchro Summon of a "Windborne" monster, you can treat this card as a non-Tuner and/or a Level 6 monster. You can also reveal up to 2 "Windborne" Spells in your hand to activate this effect; Special Summon this card from your hand by shuffling up to 2 cards from your hand into the Deck, including "Windborne" Spells you revealed to activate this effect (if any), and if you do, during the next Standby Phase, add 1 "Windborne" card from your Deck to your hand for each card you shuffled into the Deck by this effect, except "Windborne Cartographer", then Set 1 "Windborne" Quick-Play Spells directly from your Deck for each card you revealed to activate this effect. The Set Quick-Play Spell(s) can be activated that turn. If this card is sent to the GY as Synchro Material: You can take 1 "Windborne" Spell from your Deck and either add it to your hand or Set it directly to your field. You can only use each effect of "Windborne Cartographer" once per turn.

name: A Whisper of Crying Chaos
text: If you control a "Crying Chaos" Synchro Monster and a Zombie Tuner: Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 "Crying Chaos" Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck using those monsters. If you control "Dragon of Crying Chaos", while this card is in your GY: You can banish this card; take control of 1 monster your opponent controls until the end of this turn, and if you do, for the rest of this turn, its effects are negated and its ATK/DEF become 0. You can only use each effect of "A Whisper of Crying Chaos" once per turn.

name: Janna, Windborne Goddess of the Temple
text: You can also reveal up to 2 "Windborne" Spells in your hand to activate this effect; Special Summon this card from your hand by shuffling up to 2 cards from your hand into the Deck, including "Windborne" Spells you revealed to activate this effect (if any), and if you do, during the next Standby Phase, add a "Windborne" card from your Deck to your hand for each card you shuffled into the Deck by this effect, except "Janna, Windborne Goddess of the Temple", then Set "Windborne" Quick-Play Spells directly from your Deck for each card you revealed to activate this effect. The Set Quick-Play Spell(s) can be activated that turn. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Windborne" card from your Deck to the GY, then you can shuffle 1 "Windborne" card with a different name from your GY into the Deck, or, if it is a Spell/Trap, you can Set it to your field. You can only use each effect of "Janna, Windborne Goddess of the Temple" once per turn.

name: Maryam, Windborne Caretaker of the Temple
text: You can also reveal up to 2 "Windborne" Spells in your hand to activate this effect; Special Summon this card from your hand by shuffling up to 2 cards from your hand into the Deck, including "Windborne" Spells you revealed to activate this effect (if any), and if you do, during the next Standby Phase, add 1 "Windborne" card from your Deck to your hand for each card you shuffled into the Deck by this effect, except "Maryam, Windborne Caretaker of the Temple", then Set "Windborne" Quick-Play Spells directly from your Deck for each card you revealed to activate this effect. The Set Quick-Play Spell(s) can be activated that turn. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Windborne" card from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Maryam, Windborne Caretaker of the Temple" once per turn.

name: Sunken Temple of the Windborne
text: Cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects while you control a "Windborne" monster. When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Windborne" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Sunken Temple of the Windborne". Once per turn, during the Standby Phase, if you add a "Windborne" card from your Deck to your hand, you can draw 1 card, and if you do, place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Deck. You can only activate 1 "Sunken Temple of the Windborne" per turn.

name: Windborne Howling Gale
text: Target 1 monster you control and 1 monster your opponent controls; return them to the hand, then, if you added 3 or more "Windborne" cards from your Deck to your hand this turn, you can Special Summon 1 "Windborne" monster from your hand. For the rest of this turn, you cannot Special Summon non-"Windborne" monsters with the same Level as that monster.

name: Windborne Eye of the Storm
text: Target 1 monster you control; banish it until the End Phase, then, if you added 3 or more "Windborne" cards from your Deck to your hand this turn, and you banished a WIND Synchro Monster by this effect, you can Special Summon 1 "Windborne" Synchro Monster with a different name from your Extra Deck (this is treated as a Synchro Summon using only "Windborne" monsters).

name: Windborne Galesong Flock
text: Declare Level 4 or 6; Special Summon 1 "Winborne Swallow Token" (Winged Beast/WIND/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) with the declared Level, then, if you added 3 or more "Windborne" cards from your Deck to your hand this turn, you can treat it as a Tuner and/or make it gain 500 ATK/DEF for each "Windborne" Quick-Play Spell you activated this Duel.

name: Windborne Divine Whirlwind
text: Target up to 2 "Windborne" cards in your GY, except "Windborne Divine Whirlwind"; add them to your hand during the next Standby Phase, or Set them to your field, then, if you added 3 or more "Windborne" cards from your Deck to your hand this turn, you can Special Summon 1 non-Synchro "Windborne" monster from your Deck or GY.

name: Muntith, Windborne Skydragon of the Shining Sun
text:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects the turn it is Synchro Summoned. If this card is Synchro Summoned using only "Windborne" monsters: You can banish all monsters your opponent controls until the End Phase. During the End Phase: You can target 1 "Windborne" monster in your GY; add that target to your hand during your next Standby Phase. You can only use each effect of "Muntith, Windborne Skydragon of the Shining Sun" once per turn.

name: Janna, Windborne Goddess of Clement Winds
text:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Cannot be targeted by card effects the turn it is Synchro Summoned. If this card is Synchro Summoned using only "Windborne" monsters: You can target up to 2 cards your opponent controls; return them to the hand, then shuffle as many cards from your hand into the Deck and if you do, during the next Standby Phase, add 1 "Windborne" card from your Deck to your hand for each card you shuffled into the Deck by this effect. During the End Phase: you can target 1 "Windborne" Spell in your GY; add that target to your hand during your next Standby Phase. You can only use each effect of "Janna, Windborne Goddess of Clement Winds" once per turn.

name: Iscylla, Windborne Kraken of Sunken Depths
text:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
While face-up on the field, this card's Attribute is also treated as WATER. You take no battle damage from battles involving this card the turn it is Synchro Summoned. When you add a "Windborne" card to your hand, this card gains 200 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn. If this card is sent to the GY: You can Special Summon it, and if you do, reduce its Level by 2, but return it to the Extra Deck when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Iscylla, Windborne Kraken of Sunken Depths" once per turn.

name: Shining Brigade - Hope Division
text: If your opponent controls a monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand or GY). You can only Special Summon "Shining Brigade - Hope Division" once per turn this way. (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 2 Level 2 "Shining Brigade" monsters from your Deck, except "Shining Brigade - Hope Division", but they cannot attack or activate their effects this turn. You can only use this effect of "Shining Brigade - Hope Division" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Shining Brigade" monsters.

name: Shining Brigade - Forward Division
text:
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Shining Brigade" Spell from your Deck or GY to your hand. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you use this effect, except "Shining Brigade" monsters. You can only use this effect of "Shining Brigade - Forward Division" once per turn. A "Shining Brigade" monster that has this card as material gains the following effect.
● Each turn, negate the effect of your opponent's first Spell Card or effect that resolves.

name: Shining Brigade - Flowering Division
text:
You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by shuffling 1 "Shining Brigade" card from your banishment or GY into the Deck. You can only Special Summon "Shining Brigade - Flowering Division" once per turn this way. A "Shining Brigade" monster that has this card as material gains the following effect.
● Once per turn: You can add 1 "Shining Brigade" card from your GY or banishment to your hand.

name: Shining Brigade - Loving Division
text:
During the Main Phase: You can target 1 "Shining Brigade" card in your GY; banish it, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. You can only use this effect of "Shining Brigade - Loving Division" once per turn. A "Shining Brigade" monster that has this card as material gains the following effect.
● Once per turn: You can Set 1 "Shining Brigade" Trap from your Deck, GY, or banishment (that Set card can be activated this turn).

name: Shining Brigade - Heartbeat Division
text:
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: you can Special Summon 1 "Shining Brigade" monster from your hand. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you use this effect, except "Shining Brigade" monsters. You can only use this effect of "Shining Brigade - Heartbeat Division" once per turn. A "Shining Brigade" monster that has this card as material gains the following effect.
● Once per turn, when your opponent activates a monster effect: You can detach 1 material from this card; banish that monster.

name: Shining Brigade - Joyous Division
text:
When a "Shining Brigade" monster is Special Summoned: You can Special Summon this card from your GY or banishment. You can only use this effect of "Shining Brigade - Joyous Division" once per turn. A "Shining Brigade" monster that has this card as material gains the following effect.
● Once per turn, during the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can roll a 6-sided die; banish cards from your opponent's GY up to half the number rolled (rounded up).

name: Shining Brigade - Melody Division
text: During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon/Set 1 "Shining Brigade" monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set (You can only gain this effect once per turn). You can banish this card from your GY: Attach 1 "Shining Brigade" monster from your Deck or GY to a "Shining Brigade" Xyz Monster you control as material. You can only use this effect of "Shining Brigade - Melody Division" once per turn.

name: Shining Brigade - Revenge Division
text:
2+ Level 2 "Shining Brigade" monsters
If a "Shining Brigade" card you control leaves the field because of your opponent's card: You can Special Summon this card from your GY, then inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the monster your opponent controls with the highest ATK. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Attach 1 "Shining Brigade" card from your Deck to this card as material. You can detach 2 materials from this card: Double the ATK/DEF of all "Shining Brigade" monsters you control until the End Phase. You can only use each effect of "Shining Brigade - Revenge Division" once per turn.

name: Shining Brigade Armada
text:
2+ Level 2 "Shining Brigade" monsters
(Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; draw 1 card. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: Special Summon "Shining Brigade" monsters from your GY or banishment up to the number of cards your opponent controls, but negate their effects. You can only use each effect of "Shining Brigade Armada" once per turn.

name: Shining Brigade Origins
text:
Pendulum Effect:
Your opponent cannot target "Shining Brigade" monsters you control with Spell/Trap effects.

Monster Effect:
3+ Level 2 "Shining Brigade" monsters
If this card is Summoned, or, if a monster is sent to your opponent's GY while this card is on the field: You can attach 1 face-up card your opponent controls to this card as material. (Quick Effect): You can detach 2 materials from this card; destroy 1 card your opponent controls, then banish 1 card in either player's GY. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect, or Tributed: You can place it in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Shining Brigade Origins" once per turn.

name: Shining Brigade - Companion Team
text:
1 non-Link "Shining Brigade" monster
While you control another "Shining Brigade" monster, this card cannot be targeted for attacks or by card effects. Once per turn, when a monster on the field declares an attack: Special Summon 1 "Shining Brigade" monster from your hand or Deck. You can only control 1 "Shining Brigade - Companion Team".

name: Shining Brigade - Absolute Supremacy
text:
2+ monsters, including a "Shining Brigade" monster
"Shining Brigade" monsters cannot be destroyed by battle. When your opponent activates a monster effect or a Spell/Trap Card (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your field until the End Phase; negate the activation, and if you do, banish it and all cards in your opponent's GY with the same name as that card. You can only use this effect of "Shining Brigade - Absolute Supremacy" once per turn.

name: Let's Go, Shining Brigade!
text: If you control no monsters: Special Summon 1 "Shining Brigade" monster from your Deck. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except LIGHT Monsters. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Shining Brigade" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Let's Go, Shining Brigade!" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

name: Shining Brigade - Stand Together!
text: "Shining Brigade" Spell/Trap Cards you control cannot be destroyed or banished while you control 2 or more "Shining Brigade" monsters. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from a "Shining Brigade" Xyz Monster you control; attach 1 "Shining Brigade" monster from your hand or GY as material. If a "Shining Brigade" monster you control activates its effect: You can draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Shining Brigade - Stand Together!" once per turn.

name: We're the Shining Brigade!
text: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Shining Brigade" monster from your Deck to your hand. During your Main Phase: You can discard any number of cards from your hand (min 2); Special Summon 1 "Shining Brigade" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck, then you can attach "Shining Brigade" monsters from your GY or banishment to that monster as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon.) You can only use each effect of "We're the Shining Brigade!" once per turn.

name: Shining Brigade - Last Stand
text: When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap effect, or a monster effect on the field: You can return 1 "Shining Brigade" monster you control to the hand; negate that effect. During the End Phase: You can shuffle up to 3 cards from your GY or banishment into your Deck, then, if you shuffled at least 2 "Shining Brigade" cards with this effect, draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Shining Brigade - Last Stand" once per turn.

name: Chrono-Saur Brachio
text: If your opponent controls 2 or more monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is Special Summoned; You can add 1 "Chrono-Saur" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. If this card is destroyed by card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Chrono-Saur" monster from your hand or GY, except "Chrono-Saur Brachio". You can only use each effect of "Chrono-Saur Brachio" once per turn.

name: Chrono-Saur Dactylus
text: During the Battle Phase, if a "Chrono-Saur" card or a Dinosaur monster in your hand or field was destroyed by card effect this turn (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card from your hand, but negate its effects. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target up to 2 cards your opponent control; destroy them. If this card is destroyed by card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Chrono-Saur" monster from your hand or GY, except "Chrono-Saur Dactylus". You can only use each effect of "Chrono-Saur Dactylus" once per turn.

name: Chrono-Saur Tricera
text: This card can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If it does, apply its DEF for damage calculation. If you Special Summoned a "Chrono-Saur" or Dinosaur monster this turn: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY in Defense Position. When your opponent activates a card effect that targets a Dinosaur monster you control, or when your opponent targets your Dinosaur monster for an attack (Quick effect): You can destroy this card, then negate that attack or effect. You can only use each effect of "Chrono-Saur Tricera" once per turn.

name: Chrono-Saur Stegian
text: You can discard this card; destroy 1 Dinosaur monster or 1 "Chrono-Saur" card you control, and if you do, draw 1 card, then shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck. If your opponent control 2 or more monsters: You can Special Summon this card from hand, then you can destroy 1 card in your hand or field. If this card is destroyed by card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Chrono-Saur" monster from your hand or GY, except "Chrono-Saur Stegian". You can only use each effect of "Chrono-Saur Stegian" once per turn.

name: Chrono-Saur Rex
text: During the Main Phase 1 or Battle Phase (Quick Effect): You can destroy 1 "Chrono-Saur" card or 1 Dinosaur monster you control, and if you do, Special Summon this card from hand. Destroy this card Summoned this way at the end of the Phase it was Summoned. When you declare an attack: You can Special Summon this card from your GY, but destroy this card at the end of the Battle Phase. You can only use each effect of "Chrono-Saur Rex" once per turn.

name: Chrono-Saur Laplace Plesio
text: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Chrono-Saur" card from your Deck to your hand. For the rest of this turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except Dinosaur monsters. If your card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can make your monsters gain 500 ATK/DEF until the end of your Battle Phase. You can only use the previous effects of "Chrono-Saur Laplace Plesio" once per turn. After damage calculation, if your Dinosaur monster battled an opponent's monster: You can destroy 1 card you control.

name: Chrono-Saur Force
text: During your turn, if your opponent controls 2 or more monsters, you can activate this card from your hand. When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or effect while you control a "Chrono-Saur" monster: Negate that activation, and if you do, you can destroy that card or 1 card in your hand or field. If this card is destroyed by card effect: You can draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Chono-Saur Force" once per turn.

name: Chrono-Saur Counter
text: During your turn, if your opponent controls 2 or more monsters, you can activate this card from your hand. When your opponent activates a monster effect while you control a "Chrono-Saur" monster: Negate that effect, and if you do, you can destroy that card or 1 card in your hand or field. If this card is destroyed by card effect: You can draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Chono-Saur Counter" once per turn.

name: Aqua Whirlpool
text: Activate only if you control 2 or more Level 8 or higher WATER Fusion Monsters. For the rest of this turn, your opponent cannot Special Summon monsters from their hand, except WATER monsters. You can only activate 1 "Aqua Whirlpool" per turn.

name: Aquila, Zephorion's Predictor
text: If you control "Eldora, the Intergalactic Empire", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Aquila, Zephorion's Predictor" once per turn this way. If this card is Summoned: You can Set 1 "Eldora" and/or "Verse IX" "Chapter II" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck or GY. If this card is destroyed by "Eldora, the Intergalactic Empire" or your opponent's card effect: You can add 1 monster that lists "Eldora" in its text from your GY to your hand, or, if "Eldora, the Intergalactic Empire" is in your GY, you can add it from your Deck instead. You can only use each effect of "Aquila, Zephorion's Predictor" once per turn.

name: Auriga of the Eldoran Empire
text: If you control "Eldora, the Intergalactic Empire": you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Auriga of the Eldoran Empire" once per turn this way. If this card is Summoned: You can draw 1 card, then place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Deck. If this card is destroyed by "Eldora, the Intergalactic Empire" or your opponent's card effect: You can add 1 "Eldora" Spell/Trap from your GY to your hand, or if "Eldora, the Intergalactic Empire" is in your GY, you can add it from your Deck instead. You can only use each effect of "Auriga of the Eldoran Empire" once per turn.

name: Eridani, Squire of Zephorion Prime
text: If "Eldora, the Intergalactic Empire" is in your field or GY (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If "Eldora, the Intergalactic Empire" is in your GY, your opponent cannot declare an attack. If this card is destroyed by "Eldora, the Intergalactic Empire" or your opponent's card effect: You can declare 1 Monster Card name; cards with that name cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Eridani, Squire of Zephorion Prime" once per turn.

name: The Spires of Zephorion Prime
text:
(This card is always treated as an "Eldora" card.)
This card is also treated as "Eldora, the Intergalactic Empire" while it is face-up on the field or in your GY. When this card is activated: Activate 1 "Eldora, the Intergalactic Empire" from your Deck, or, if it is already face-up on your field, add 1 monster from your Deck to your hand that lists "Eldora" in its text. When your opponent's card effect that would destroy your monster resolves, you can destroy this card you control.

name: Chapter II Verse IV
text:
(This card is also treated as "The Hallowed Scripts of the Ataxia".)
When your opponent activates a card effect: You can show 1 "Dysmandr, the Depraevity of Worlds" in your Extra Deck and choose 1 Effect Monster you control; Send 1 "Extinction of Dysmandr" from your Deck to the GY (but shuffle it into the Deck during the End Phase), and if you do, your opponent's activated card effect becomes the sent card's effect that Tributes a "Protogenic Essence Token" to activate.

name: Aqua Droplet
text:
(This card is always treated as an "Aquamarine" card.)
If you control a WATER monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your GY). You can only Special Summon "Aqua Droplet" once per turn this way. If this card is banished from your GY: You can target 1 "Aquamarine" Spell/Trap in your GY; shuffle it into the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Aqua Droplet" once per turn.

name: Aquamarine Moon Aurelia
text: If you control an "Aquamarine" monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Aquamarine Moon Aurelia" once per turn this way. You can only use each of the following effects of "Aquamarine Moon Aurelia" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Aquamarine" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. If this card is banished from your GY: You can Fusion Summon 1 "Aquamarine" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from your field and/or GY.

name: Aquamarine Plate Montipora
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned; You can add 1 "Aquamarine" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Aquamarine Plate Montipora", also, for the rest of this turn after this effect resolves, you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except WATER monsters.
