You can banish this card from your GY; Fusion Summon 1 WATER Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as material. You can only use each effect of "Aquamarine Plate Montipora" once per turn.

name: Aquamarine Pisaster Giga
text: If you control a WATER Aqua monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Aquamarine Pisaster Giga" once per turn this way. You can only use each of the following effects of "Aquamarine Pisaster Giga" once per turn. You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Aquamarine" monster from your Deck, except "Aquamarine Pisaster Giga". If this card is banished from your GY: You can target 1 of your banished "Aquamarine" monsters, except "Aquamarine Pisaster Giga"; add it to your hand.

name: Aquamarine Asthenosoma
text: If you control a WATER Aqua monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your GY). You can only Special Summon "Aquamarine Asthenosoma" once per turn this way. You can only use each of the following effects of "Aquamarine Asthenosoma" once per turn. You can discard this card; send 1 "Aquamarine" monster from your Deck to the GY, except "Aquamarine Asthenosoma". If this card is banished from your GY: You can target 1 of your Banished "Aquamarine" cards, except "Aquamarine Asthenosoma", return it to the GY.

name: Aquamarine Calling
text: Add 1 Level 4 or lower "Aquamarine" monster from your Deck to your hand. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck the turn you activate this card, except WATER monsters. You can only activate 1 "Aquamarine Calling" per turn.

name: Treasure of the Cosmic Ocean
text: Discard 1 card; add 1 Level 4 or lower WATER Aqua, Fish, or Sea Serpent monster from your Deck to your hand. You cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters the turn you use this effect, except WATER Monsters. You can only activate 1 "Treasure of the Cosmic Ocean" per turn.

name: Aqua Fusion
text:
(This card is always treated as an "Aquamarine" card.)
Fusion Summon 1 "Aquamarine" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using 2 monsters from your hand, Deck, or field as Fusion Material. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except WATER Fusion Monsters, the turn you use this effect. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY; Fusion Summon 1 "Aquamarine" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by shuffling Fusion Materials listed on it its materials into the Deck, from among your cards on the field, in your GY, and/or your face-up banished cards. You can only use each effect of "Aqua Fusion" once per turn.

name: Aquamarine Bubble Surge
text:
During the Main Phase: You can activate 1 of these effects.
● Target Spell/Trap Cards your opponent controls, up to the number of WATER Fusion Monsters you control with different names; destroy them.
● Target monsters your opponent controls, up to the number of WATER Fusion Monsters you control with different names; return them to the hand.
You can use this effect of "Aquamarine Bubble Surge" once per turn.

name: Aquamarine Planktonites
text:
2 "Aquamarine" monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 WATER Aqua monster in your GY or banishment, except "Aquamarine Planktonites"; Special Summon it. During your Main Phase: You can Fusion Summon 1 "Aquamarine" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as material, including this card. You can only use each effect of "Aquamarine Planktonites" once per turn.

name: Aquamarine Nautilus
text:
1 "Aquamarine" monster + 1 WATER Aqua monster
If this card is Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Aquamarine" card from your hand or Deck to the GY. (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card, then target 1 WATER Aqua monster you control; your opponent cannot target it with card effects this turn. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Aquamarine monster from your GY, except "Aquamarine Nautilus". You can only use each effect of "Aquamarine Nautilus" once per turn.

name: Aquamarine Actinia
text:
1 Level 7 or higher "Aquamarine" monster + 1 WATER Aqua monster
If you control a WATER Aqua monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your GY). You can only Special Summon "Aquamarine Actinia" once per turn this way. When a card or effect is activated, while you control another "Aquamarine" monster (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 WATER Aqua monster from your GY; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card. You can only use this effect of "Aquamarine Actinia" once per turn.

name: Aquamarine Physalia
text:
1 "Aquamarine" Fusion monster + 1 "Aquamarine" monster
During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You banish 1 "Aquamarine" card from your GY; destroy 1 card your opponent controls. You can use this effect of "Aquamarine Physalia" a number of times per turn, up to the number of Level 7 or higher "Aquamarine" monsters you control, except "Aquamarine Physalia". If you control "Aquamarine Glaucus", your opponent cannot activate monster effects in response to this card's effect activation.

name: Aquamarine Glaucus
text:
1 WATER Fusion Monster + 1 "Aquamarine" monster
If this card is Special Summoned: You can banish cards from your opponent's GY up to the number of "Aquamarine" monsters you control, except "Aquamarine Glaucus". You can only use this effect of "Aquamarine Glaucus" once per turn. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster on the field; reduce its ATK to 0, and if you do, this card gains ATK equal to half that monster's original ATK until the end of this turn. You can use this effect of "Aquamarine Glaucus" a number of times per turn, up to the number of Level 7 or higher "Aquamarine" monsters you control, except "Aquamarine Glaucus".

name: Aquamarine Reef Hapalochlaena
text:
2 Level 7 or higher "Aquamarine" Fusion Monsters
Must be Fusion Summoned. Unaffected by other card effects while "Aquamarine Glaucus" or "Aquamarine Physalia" is in your GY. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Aquamarine" Fusion Monster from your GY, except "Aquamarine Reef Hapalochlaena"; inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. You can use this effect of "Aquamarine Reef Hapalochlaena" a number of times per turn, up to the number of Level 8 or higher "Aquamarine" monsters you control, except "Aquamarine Reef Hapalochlaena".

name: Hiding "C"
text: If your opponent activates a monster effect that includes an effect that Special Summons a monster(s) (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If Summoned this way, while this card is face-up on the field, your opponent cannot banish cards. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can add 1 EARTH Insect monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck to your hand, except "Hiding "C"". You can only use each effect of "Hiding "C"" once per turn.

name: Farad, the Purple Ohmen
text: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) to a zone a Link Monster points to. If this card is Special Summoned to a zone a Link Monster points to: Place 1 Current Counter on all Link Monsters that point to this card and follow the Link Arrows of those monsters, placing 1 Current Counter on each co-linked monster they point to, repeating the process until all Link Monsters you control with a Current Counter placed by this card's effect points to a Main Monster Zone(s) and no other co-linked monster, then move this card to 1 of those zones (if possible), and if you do, Special Summon 1 Thunder monster from your GY to one of those zones. You can only use this effect of "Farad, the Purple Ohmen" once per turn.

name: Volt, the Green Ohmen
text: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) to a zone a Link Monster points to. If this card is Special Summoned to a zone a Link Monster points to: Place 1 Current Counter on all Link monsters that point to this card and follow the Link Arrows of those monsters, placing 1 Current Counter on each co-linked monster they point to, repeating the process until all Link Monsters you control with a Current Counter placed by this card's effect points to a Main Monster Zone(s) and no other co-linked monster, then move this card to 1 of those zones (if possible), and if you do, Special Summon 1 Thunder monster from your hand to one of those zones. You can only use this effect of "Volt, the Green Ohmen" once per turn.

name: Ampere, the Yellow Ohmen
text: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) to a zone a Link Monster points to. If this card is Special Summoned to a zone a Link Monster points to: Place 1 Current Counter on all Link Monsters that point to this card and follow the Link Arrows of those monsters, placing 1 Current Counter on each co-linked monster they point to, repeating the process until all Link Monsters you control with a Current Counter placed by this card's effect points to a Main Monster Zone(s) and no other co-linked monster, then move this card to 1 of those zones (if possible). During the Main Phase: you can add "Ohmen" monsters with different names whose total Levels equal the number of Current Counters placed by this card's effect from your Deck to your hand, also, for the rest of this turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Ohmen" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Ampere, the Yellow Ohmen" once per turn.

name: Siemens, the Blue Ohmen
text: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) to a zone a Link Monster points to. If this card is Special Summoned to a zone a Link Monster points to: Place 1 Current Counter on all Link monsters that point to this card and follow the Link Arrows of those monsters, placing 1 Current Counter on each co-linked monster they point to, repeating the process until all Link Monsters you control with a Current Counter placed by this card's effect points to a Main Monster Zone(s) and no other co-linked monster, then move this card to 1 of those zones (if possible), and if you do, add 1 "Ohmen" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Siemens, the Blue Ohmen" once per turn.

name: Coulomb, the White Ohmen
text: If you control no monster or all monsters you control are Thunder Monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is Special Summoned to a zone a Link Monster points to: Place 1 Current counter on all Link Monsters that point to this card and follow the Link Arrows of those monsters, placing 1 Current Counter on each co-linked monster they point to, repeating the process until all Link monsters you control with a Current Counter placed by this card's effect points to a Main Monster Zone(s) and no other co-linked monster, then move this card to 1 of those zones (if possible). During your Main Phase, you can send any number of "Ohmen" cards from your hand to the GY; Special Summon "Ohmen" monster(s) from your Extra Deck whose total Link Rating equal the number of cards sent to the GY to activate this effect, then place 1 Current Counter on them. You can only use each effect of "Coulomb, the White Ohmen" once per turn.

name: Carcel, the Dark Ohmen
text: You can reveal this card in your hand and 1 "Ohmen" monster in your Deck; Special Summon both monsters. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you use this effect except "Ohmen" monsters. If this card is used as Link Material: You can target 1 "Ohmechanic" monster you control; place 1 Current Counter on it for each "Ohmen" monster you control. You can only use each effect of "Carcel, the Dark Ohmen" once per turn.

name: Ohmen Surge
text: If your monster becomes co-linked, place 1 Current Counter on it. If your opponent activates a Spell Card or effect, and you control an "Ohmechanic" monster: You can target 1 monster your opponents controls; place that target in your zone your co-linked monster points to, and take control of it. You can only activate 1 "Ohmen Surge" per turn

name: Siemens, the Ohmechanic Conductor
text:
"Ohmen" monsters
This card's ATK become 0 while it has no Current Counters on it. This card gains effects based on the number of Current Counters on it.
1+: During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Ohmen" monster from your GY.
2+: (Quick Effect): Move 1 monster on the controller's field that your co-linked monster points to.
3+: (Quick Effect): You can remove all Current Counters from this card, then target 1 monster your opponents controls; place that target in your Main Monster Zone your co-linked monster points to.
You can only use each effect of "Siemens, the Ohmechanic Conductor" once per turn.

name: Farad, the Ohmechanic Capacitor
text:
2 monsters including a Thunder monster
This card's ATK become 0 while it has no Current Counters on it. This card gains effects based on the number of Current Counters on it.
1+: During the Main Phase: You can target 1 card your opponents control; banish it.
2+: During the Main Phase: You can target 1 "Ohmen" card in your GY or banishment; add it to your hand.
3+: (Quick effect): remove all Current Counters on this card and Link Monsters co-linked to it; banish up to 3 cards in your opponent GY.
You can only use each effect of "Farad, the Ohmechanic Capacitor" once per turn.

name: Volt, the Ohmechanic Chocker
text:
2 monsters including an "Ohmen" monster
This card's ATK becomes 0 while it has no Current Counters on it. This card gains the following effects based on the number of Current Counters on it:
1+: During your Main Phase: You can remove all Current Counters on this card; inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each.
2+: "Ohmechanic" monsters you control gain 500 ATK.
3+: During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.
You can only use each effect of "Volt, the Ohmechanic Chocker" once per turn.

name: Coulomb, the Ohmechanic Charger
text:
2 Thunder monsters including an "Ohmen" monster
This card ATK become 0 while it has no Current Counters on it. This card gains effects based on the number of Current Counters on it.
1+: You can move 1 Link monster you controls to another of your Main Monster zones, then place 1 Current Counter on it.
2+: During your Main Phase: you can add 1 "Ohmen" Spell/Trap card from your Deck yo your hand.
3+: During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can remove all Current Counters from this card; immediately after this effect resolves, Link Summon 1 "Ohmen" monster from your Extra Deck using monsters you control as material.
You can only use each effect of "Coulomb, the Ohmechanic Charger" once per turn.

name: Ampere, the Ohmechanic Intensity
text:
2 Thunder monsters including an "Ohmen" monster
This card's ATK become 0 while it has no Current Counters on it. This card gains the following effects based on the number of Current Counters on it:
1+: During your Main Phase: You can add 1 "Ohmen" monster from your Deck to your hand, then discard 1 card.
2+: Place 1 Current Counter on each monster this card is co-linked to.
3+: "Ohmechanic" monsters co-linked to this card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects.
You can only use each effect of "Ampere, the Ohmechanic Intensity" once per turn.

name: Carcel, the Ohmechanic Light
text:
3+ monsters including an "Ohmechanic" monster
If this card is Link Summoned, You can Special Summon 1 "Ohmen" monster from your GY. This card's ATK is doubled while it has a Current Counter on it. If this card becomes co-linked, place Current Counters equal to the combined Link Ratings of all monsters co-linked to this card on this card, and all monsters you control that are co-linked to this card. When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can remove all Current Counters on your field (min 5); destroy all monsters your opponent controls. You can only use each effect of "Carcel, the Ohmechanic Light" once per turn.

name: Ohmen Powerload
text:
Activate 1 of these effects;
● Target 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls; negate its effects, then you can remove 2 Current Counters from the field, and if you do destroy 1 card your opponents controls.
● Special Summon 1 "Ohmen" monster from your Deck.
You can only activate 1 "Ohmen Powerload" per turn, and if you do, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except Thunder monsters.

name: Ohmen Beacon
text: When this card is activated: You can Special Summon 1 Thunder monster from your hand, or, if you control an "Ohmechanic" monster, you can Special Summon 1 "Ohmen" monster from your GY instead. Co-linked monsters you controls with a Current Counter cannot be targeted by your opponent card effect. Once per turn: You can move 1 monster you control to another Main Monster zone, then place 1 Current Counter on all co-linked monsters you control. You can only activate 1 "Ohmen Beacon" per turn.

name: Altergeist Pipesiren
text: If you Special Summon an "Altergeist" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. If Summoned from the GY this way, banish this card when it leaves the field. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 Trap from your Deck to your hand that lists "Altergeist" in its text. You can only use each effect of "Altergeist Pipesiren" once per turn.

name: Altergeist Regissae
text:
1+ "Altergeist" monsters
This card can only be Special Summoned by a Link Summon. You can only Link Summon 1 "Altergeist Regissae" per turn. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 "Altergeist" monster from your hand or field; negate the effects of 1 face-up card on the field. If this card is sent from field to GY: You can target 1 "Altergeist" Trap in your GY; Set it to your field. You can only use each effect of "Altergeist Regissae" once per turn.

name: Altergeist Ifritware
text:
1 Tuner + 1 non-Tuner monster
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can target 1 "Altergeist" monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position. When your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 "Altergeist" monster; negate that effect, then add 1 Trap from your GY to your hand that lists "Altergeist" in its text. You can only use each effect of "Altergeist Ifritware" once per turn.

name: Dragon Protector of Nature
text:
1 Tuner monster + 1+ non-Tuner Synchro Monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned using a NATURE Tuner as material: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower NATURE monster from your Deck or GY. You can only use this effect of "Dragon Protector of Nature" once per turn. Your opponent cannot target NATURE monsters you control with card effects. All monsters your opponent controls must attack this card, if able.
hiddenReason: Per admin request (Dragon Protector of Nature)

name: Advent of Cosmic Beings
text: Add 1 Level 4 or lower Galaxy or Celestial Warrior monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Advent of Cosmic Beings" per turn.

name: Transcend the Pendulum
text:
3+ Effect Monsters, including a Synchro, Fusion, or Xyz Pendulum Monster
If this card is Link Summoned: You can destroy all Spell and Trap Cards on the field, then take 1 Pendulum Monster from your Deck and Pendulum Monster from your face-up Extra Deck with a different name and place them in your Pendulum Zones. You can activate this effect; Immediately after this effect resolves, Pendulum Summon a Pendulum Monster(s) in Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Transcend the Pendulum" once per turn.

name: Striking Mirror Force
text: When your opponent activates a card or effect, or a monster declares an attack: Destroy that card, then you can destroy 1 Attack Position monster your opponent controls. You can only activate 1 "Striking Mirror Force" per turn.

name: Rising Elemental
text:
3 Tuners with different Attributes + 3 non-Tuners with different Attributes
This card's Attribute is also treated as WIND, WATER, FIRE, EARTH, and DARK while it is face-up on the field. If this card is Synchro Summoned using 6 monsters with different Attributes, it gains the following effect:
● Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 monster from your GY; banish all monsters in your opponents field and GY that have the same Attribute as the banished monster.
Unaffected by the activated effects of monsters your opponent controls that have the same Attribute as other monsters you controls.

name: Yummy Kuriboh
text: When your opponent's monster declares an attack: You can Special Summon this card and 1 Level 1 monster from your hand or GY, and if you do, negate that attack. You can only use this effect of "Yummy Kuriboh" once per turn. Level 1 monsters cannot be destroyed by battle.

name: Sealed Glyphs Dragon
text:
2+ Level 7 monsters
You can also Xyz Summon this card by using 1 monster you control and 1 face-up Spell/Trap your opponent owns (even if you do not control it). (Transfer its materials to this card.) If Summoned this way, you cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; this card is unaffected by your opponent's Spell/Trap Cards and effects until the end of this turn.

name: Devotee of Fire
text: If you control a FIRE Dragon monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your GY). You can only Special Summon "Devotee of Fire" once per turn this way. You can only use each of the following effects of "Devotee of Fire" once per turn. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 Dragon monster from your Extra Deck to the GY. Set 1 Spell/Trap that lists "Phlogiston Dragon" in its text directly from your Deck or GY. When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or effect, while you control a "Phlogiston Dragon" (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; negate that activation.

name: Shaman of Fire
text: If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by sending 1 Dragon monster from your Extra Deck to the GY. If Summoned this way, you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except FIRE monsters. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 Spell that lists "Phlogiston Dragon" in its text from your Deck to the GY, then discard 1 card; this effect becomes that Spell Card's effect when that card is activated. You can only use this effect of "Shaman of Fire" once per turn.

name: Guardian of Fire
text: If you control a FIRE Dragon monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your GY). You can only Special Summon "Guardian of Fire" once per turn this way. You can send this card from your hand to the GY, then discard 1 card; add 1 monster that lists "Phlogiston Dragon" in its text from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Guardian of Fire" once per turn. FIRE Dragon monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle.

name: Phlogistic Uprising!
text: Fusion Summon 1 FIRE Dragon monster from your GY or Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material and/or by shuffling the required Fusion Materials into the Deck, from your monsters in the GY, then pay any number of LP in multiples of 300. You can only use the following effect of "Phlogistic Uprising!" once per turn. You can shuffle 1 "Phlogiston Dragon" from your GY into the Deck; Set this card from your GY to your field, but banish it when it leaves the field.

name: Phlogistic Ignition
text: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to half the LP you paid this turn, then, if you control a FIRE Dragon monster you can make all FIRE monsters you currently control gain ATK equal to half the damage inflicted. If you pay LP while this card is in your GY and you control a "Phlogiston Dragon": You can Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Phlogistic Ignition" once per turn.

name: Phlogiston's Wake
text:
When you activate this card, you can also pay any number of LP in multiples of 300; apply 1 of these effects.
● Make 1 "Phlogiston Dragon" you control gain 1 additional attack during the Battle Phase this turn for every monster your opponent controls with a lower ATK than it.
● For the rest of this turn, monsters your opponent controls must attack 1 "Phlogiston Dragon" you currently control (your choice), if able.
You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 FIRE monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position. You can only use 1 effect of "Phlogiston's Wake" per turn and only once that turn.

name: Phlogiston Dragon
text:
2 FIRE monsters, except "Phlogiston Dragon"
Unaffected by the effects of monsters with a lower ATK than this card. Gains 1 additional attack during the Battle Phase for each monster your opponent controls with a lower ATK than this card. Monsters your opponent controls lose ATK/DEF equal to the LP you paid this turn while you controlled this face-up card. If this card is sent to the GY: You can send up to 2 cards that lists "Phlogiston Dragon" in its text from your Deck to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Phlogiston Dragon" once per turn.

name: Phlogistic Scorching Dragon Horde
text:
1 Level 8 "Phlogiston Dragon" + 2 FIRE monsters, except "Phlogiston Dragon"
This card's name becomes "Phlogiston Dragon" while face-up on the field and in the GY. If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can destroy cards your opponent controls for every 900 LP you paid this turn while you controlled a "Phlogiston Dragon". If this card is sent to the GY: You can choose 3 monsters that lists "Phlogiston Dragon" in its text in your Deck or Extra Deck and 1 Phlogiston Dragon you control (if any); send them to the GY, but they cannot activate their effects. You can only use each effect of "Phlogistic Scorching Dragon Horde" once per turn.

name: Bhodi, The Corrupted Halloween Tree
text:
2 DARK Fiend monsters
If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can Special Summon up to 2 Fiend monsters from your GY or banishment, but their effects are negated. When your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick effect): You can Tribute 1 other Fiend monster you control; equip that monster to this card as an Equip Spell, and if you do, this card is unaffected by monster effects while it's equipped with that monster. You can only use each effect of "Bhodi, The Corrupted Halloween Tree" once per turn.

name: Toddler Pumpkien
text: If you control no monsters, or only DARK Zombie monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is sent to the GY as material for the Fusion, Synchro or Link Summon of a DARK Zombie monster: You can add 1 DARK Zombie monster from your Deck to your hand whose ATK is less than or equal to that monster's original ATK. You can only use each effect of "Toddler Pumpkien" once per turn, also you cannot Special Summon the turn you activate either of these effects, except Zombie monsters.

name: Dreadful Soul Drain
text: At the start of your Main Phase 1: Discard 2 cards; return all monsters on the field to the hand. If this face-up card is sent from the field to the GY: Draw cards (max. 2) equal to the number of monsters on the field. You cannot activate cards or effects in response to the activation of this card and its effects.

name: Myutant EL-51
text: You can banish this card from your hand; add 1 "Myutant Evolution Lab" from your Deck or banishment to your hand. You can banish 1 card from your hand or face-up field; Special Summon 1 monster from your hand or Deck, based on the banished card. ● Monster: "Myutant M-05" ● Spell/Trap: "Myutant ST-46". You can only use each effect of "Myutant EL-51" once per turn.

name: Myutant Evolution
text: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Myutant" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Myutant Evolution", then you can place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card. If this card is banished: You can target 1 Level 8 or higher "Myutant" monster you control; shuffle it into the Deck, then banish 1 "Myutant" card from your hand or Deck, and if you do, Special Summon 1 monster from your hand or Deck, based on the banished card. ● Monster: "Myutant Beast" ● Spell: "Myutant Mist" ● Trap: "Myutant Arsenal". You can only use each effect of "Myutant Evolution" once per turn.

name: Myutant Amalgamate
text: 2 "Myutant" monsters. If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can Set 1 "Myutant" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck, GY, or banishment. During your Main Phase: You can reveal 1 "Myutant" card from your Deck; send it to the GY, then banish 1 monster from your Deck based on the revealed card, and if you do, this effect becomes that monster's original effect. ● Monster: "Myutant Beast" ● Spell: "Myutant Mist" ● Trap: "Myutant Arsenal". You can only use each effect of "Myutant Amalgamate" once per turn.

name: Pumpqueen the Queen of Ghosts
text: If you control "Pumpking the King of Ghosts": You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then add 1 "Castle of Dark Illusions" from your Deck to your hand. You can Normal Summon it in addition to your Normal Summon/Set this turn, also you can use monsters from your hand as Tribute for its Normal Summon. You can only use this effect of "Pumpqueen the Queen of Ghosts" once per turn.

name: Pumprince the Prince of Ghosts
text: Once per turn, if you control "Pumprincess the Princess of Ghosts": You can place 3 Pumpkin Counters on this card. Once per turn, during the Standby Phase: Place 1 Pumpkin Counter on this card. All monsters your opponent controls lose 100 ATK and DEF for each Pumpkin Counter on the field.

name: Hallo, The Giver of Tricks
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Hallo-Ween!" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Ween" monster from your Deck or GY. You can only use each effect of "Hallo, The Giver of Tricks" once per turn.

name: Ween, Guidance to Treats
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower Zombie or Fiend monster from either GY to your field, but it cannot activate its effects while you control it. If this card is sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Hallo" monster from your hand. You can only use each effect of "Ween, Guidance to Treats" once per turn.

name: Hallo, The Hollow Trickster
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned by the effect of "A Night of Fright on Hallo-Ween!". If this card is Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Hallo, the Spirit of Tricks" from your hand or GY, then inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each Fiend monster in your GY. If this card is sent to the GY: Take 500 damage for each Fiend monster in your GY, then add 1 "Hallo-Ween" Spell from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Hallo, The Hollow Trickster" once per turn.

name: Hallo-Ween! Basket of Treats
text: Tribute 1 "Hallo" or "Ween" monster from your hand or field; then apply the appropriate effect based on which monster you Tributed. ● "Hallo": Special Summon 1 "Ween" monster from your Deck or GY. ● "Ween": Special Summon 1 "Hallo" monster from your Deck or hand. You can banish this card from your GY, except the turn it was sent there, then target 1 Level 6 or higher monster your opponent controls; inflict 500 damage to your opponent equal to that monster's original Level, then destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Hallo-Ween! Basket of Treats" once per turn.

name: Happy Hallo-Ween!
text: When you Special Summon a "Hallo" or "Ween" Monster, place 1 Halloween Counter on this card. Once per turn: You can remove exactly 3 Halloween Counters from this card; Special Summon 1 "Hallo" or "Ween" monster from your hand or GY.

name: A Night of Fright on Hallo-Ween!
text: During the Main Phase or Battle Phase: You can send 1 "Ween" monster from your field to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Hallo, The Hollow Trickster" from your hand, Deck, banishment, or GY. You can only activate 1 "A Night of Fright on Hallo-Ween!" per turn.

name: Skewy! Boo Boo
text: When your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can send 1 "Skewy!" card from your hand or field to the GY; return this card to the hand, and if you do, negate that activation. If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Skewy!" monster from your GY to your hand, except "Skewy! Boo-Boo". You can only use each effect of "Skewy! Boo-Boo" once per turn.

name: Skewy! Candee Hex
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: Place 1 Candy Counter on 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, or place 2 instead if you control another "Skewy!" monster. Monsters your opponent controls with Candy Counters cannot activate their effects while you control a "Skewy!" monster, also they lose 300 ATK. (Quick Effect): You can remove exactly 2 Candy Counters from monsters your opponent controls; draw 1 card or Special Summon 1 "Skewy!" monster from your Deck in Defense Position, but its effects are negated until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Skewy! Candee-Hex" once per turn.

name: Skewy! Pumpki-Pal
text: If your opponent controls more monsters than you do, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: Reveal the top card of your Deck and if it is a "Skewy!" card, add it to your hand, then if it is a monster you can Special Summon it. Otherwise, send it to the GY. If this card is sent to the GY: You can place 1 Candy Counter on 1 face-up monster your opponent controls. You can only use each effect of "Skewy! Pumpki-Pal" once per turn.

name: Skewy! Twick-or-Tweat
text: Activate 1 of these effects; ● Add 1 "Skewy!" monster from your Deck to your hand ● Special Summon 1 "Skewy!" monster from your hand, or if your opponent controls a monster with a Candy Counter and you control a "Skewy!" monster: You can Special Summon 1 "Skewy!" monster from your Deck instead. You can only activate 1 "Skewy! Twick-or-Tweat" per turn.

name: Skewy! Pawty Tyme
text: When your opponent activates a card or effect, while you control a "Skewy!" monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card, then you can Special Summon 1 "Skewy!" monster from your GY. If your opponent controls a monster with a Candy Counter: You can activate this card from your hand by sending 1 "Skewy!" card from your hand or field to the GY. You can only activate 1 "Skewy! Pawty Tyme" per turn.

name: Crewal Cap'n
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Crewal" card from your Deck to your hand. During the Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 Monster Card you control that is treated as a Trap Card. You can send 1 face-up "Crewal" Spell/Trap Card you control to the GY; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. You cannot Special Summon the turn you activate this effect, except Zombie monsters. You can only use each effect of "Crewal Cap'n" once per turn.

name: Crewal Crew
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Crewal" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can target 1 face-up Zombie monster you control; place it in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Trap and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. You can only use each effect of "Crewal Crew" once per turn.

name: Crewal Helmsman
text: You can send 1 face-up Spell/Trap Card you control to the GY; Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Zombie monster from your GY. You cannot Special Summon the turn you activate this effect, except Zombie monsters. If this card is a Continuous Trap: You can Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Crewal Helmsman" once per turn.

name: Crewal Sailor
text: You can send 1 "Crewal" card from your Deck to the GY; place this card from your hand in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Trap. You cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Zombie monsters. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 "Crewal" card or Zombie monster in your banishment or GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Crewal Sailor" once per turn.

name: Morbydrip The Crewal Whale
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; place it and this card face-up in their owners' Spell & Trap Zones as Continuous Traps in their same columns. (If the Zones are occupied, destroy the occupying card.) While this card is a Continuous Trap, if an opponent monster is Special Summoned in this card's column: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do during the End Phase of this turn banish all Monster Cards in the Spell & Trap Zones, except "Morbydrip The Crewal Whale". You can only use this effect of "Morbydrip The Crewal Whale" once per turn. You can only control 1 "Morbydrip The Crewal Whale".

name: Crewal Booty
text: When this card is activated: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower "Crewal" monster from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn: You can send 1 other face-up Spell/Trap Card you control to the GY; place 1 Zombie monster from your banishment or GY to your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Trap, then you can Special Summon 1 Zombie Monster Card from your Spell & Trap Zone. You can only use each effect of "Crewal Booty" once per turn.

name: Crewal Meeting
text: Send 1 face-up Continuous Trap you control to the GY; Place 1 Level 5 or higher Zombie monster from your Deck, banishment or GY face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Trap. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Crewal" card or Zombie monster in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Crewal Meeting" once per turn.

name: Crewal Tide
text: When this card is activated: You can send 1 Level 4 or lower Zombie monster from your Deck to the GY. You cannot Special Summon the turn you activate this effect, except "Crewal" monsters. If a monster is Special Summoned from the owner's Spell & Trap Zone: You can Special Summon 1 Zombie Monster Card from your Spell & Trap Zone or "Crewal" monster from your banishment or GY. You can only use each effect of "Crewal Tide" once per turn.

name: Crewal Attack
text: During the Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 Zombie monster from your Spell & Trap Zone. If your opponent Special Summons a monster from the Extra Deck: You can place 1 face-up monster you control in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Trap, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; place it in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Trap. You can only use each effect of "Crewal Attack" once per turn.

name: Crewal Cursed Sea
text: 3+ Level 4 Zombie monsters. Once per turn you can also Xyz Summon "Crewal Cursed Sea" the turn 2 or more monsters have been Special Summoned from your Spell & Trap Zone by using a Zombie monster you control as material. If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can target 1 Zombie monster in your GY; place it in your Spell & Trap Zone. Gains 1000 ATK for each monster card in your Spell & Trap Zone. Your opponent cannot target this card for attacks or with card effects. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 monster from your Spell & Trap Zone. You can only use each effect of "Crewal Cursed Sea" once per turn.

name: Melville the Crewal Vessel
text: 2+ Level 4 Zombie monsters. If this card is Special Summoned while it has no material: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; attach it to this card as material. While this card has material (Quick Effect): You can detach all materials from this card, then place this card in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Trap; excavate that many cards from the top of your Deck, and if you do, you can add any excavated "Crewal" cards to your hand, then place the rest on the bottom of your Deck. You cannot Special Summon the turn you activate this effect, except Zombie monsters. You can only use each effect of "Melville the Crewal Vessel" once per turn. You can only control 1 "Melville the Crewal Vessel".

name: Ghostrick Bat
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned, unless you control a "Ghostrick" monster. Once per turn: You can change this card to face-down Defense Position. You cannot Special Summon, except "Ghostrick" monsters. Cannot be used as Link Material. When your opponent activates the effect of a monster that began the Duel in the Extra Deck (Quick Effect): You can target that monster and 1 "Ghostrick" Xyz Monster you control; Special Summon this card from your hand in face-down Defense Position, then attach the first target to the second target, and if you do, take damage equal to the difference in both monsters' original ATK.

name: Ghostrick Djinn
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned, unless you control a "Ghostrick" monster. Once per turn: You can change this card to face-down Defense Position. If you Set a monster(s) or Special Summon a "Ghostrick" monster(s): You can Special Summon this card from your hand in face-down Defense Position. If this card is flipped face-up: You can declare 1 Level between 1 and 4, then target any number of "Ghostrick" monsters you control; they become that declared Level. An Xyz Monster with this card as material gains this effect. ● Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; change it to face-down Defense Position.

name: Ghostrick Slime
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned, unless you control a "Ghostrick" monster. Once per turn: You can change this card to face-down Defense Position. Cannot be used as Link Material. If your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) (Quick Effect): You can target 1 of those monsters; Special Summon this card from your hand in face-down Defense Position, then you can Set that monster, also you cannot Special Summon until the end of your next turn, except "Ghostrick" monsters. You can only use this effect of "Ghostrick Slime" once per turn.

name: Ghostrick Haunt
text: Once per turn: You can change 1 monster you control to face-up or face-down Defense Position, then you can return 1 monster on the field to its owner's hand. You must control another "Ghostrick" card to activate and resolve this effect. If a Level 1 "Ghostrick" monster activates its effect in the hand while this card is in your GY: You can Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field.

name: Ghostrick Camella
text:
2 Level 2 monsters, including a "Ghostrick" monster
Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; add 1 "Ghostrick" monster from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent to the GY: You can target up to 2 "Ghostrick" cards in your banishment or GY, except "Ghostrick Camella"; attach them to a "Ghostrick" Xyz Monster you control.

name: Ghostrick Cutifer
text:
2+ Level 4 monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon this card by using a Rank 3 or lower "Ghostrick" Xyz Monster you control (transfer its materials). Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 Set card your opponent controls; Set that card to your field, also, if it was a monster, it can be Flip Summoned this turn. Once per turn: You can target 1 other "Ghostrick" monster you control; attach this card to it as material. (Transfer its materials to that monster.)

name: Ghostrick Oni
text:
2+ Level 1 monsters, including a "Ghostrick" monster
Gains 200 DEF for each "Ghostrick" card in your GY. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can attach 1 "Ghostrick" card from your Deck to this card, and if you do, immediately after this effect resolves Xyz Summon 1 Rank 3 or lower "Ghostrick" monster you control using this card as material (transfer this card's materials to that monster), also, it can activate its effects as Quick Effects this turn. If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 "Ghostrick" monster you control or in your GY; monsters your opponent controls lose ATK equal to the ATK of that monster.

name: Ghostrick Pastrygeist
text:
2+ Level 3 "Ghostrick" monsters
Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; Set 1 "Ghostrick" card from your Deck. (Quick Effect): You can change 1 Set "Ghostrick" monster to face-up Defense Position. If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 "Ghostrick" card in your GY; Set it.

name: Vampire Avenger
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Vampire" monster from your hand. If this card is in your GY, you can pay 500 LP; Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Vampire Avenger" once per turn.

name: Vampire Lugat
text: If this card is added to your hand, except by drawing it: You can pay 500 LP; Special Summon this card. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Vampire" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Vampire Lugat" once per turn.

name: Vampire Reptilian
text: If this card is in your hand (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster your opponent controls and pay 500 LP; Special Summon this card, then if you control a "Vampire" Link and Xyz Monster, you can make this card and that monster Level 8, then, immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon a "Vampire" monster using this card and that monster as material. You can only use this effect of "Vampire Reptilian" once per duel.

name: Vampire Traveler
text: You can pay 500 LP; Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Vampire" card from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent to the GY: You can pay 500 LP; Special Summon 1 "Vampire" monster from your GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Vampire Traveler" once per turn.

name: Vampire Estrie
text:
2+ Zombie monsters, including a "Vampire" monster
If this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it, then gain LP equal to that monster's ATK. You can pay 1000 LP; add 1 Level 2 or lower "Vampire" monster from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Vampire Estrie" once per turn.

name: Pot of Gambling
text: Declare 1 card name; roll a six-sided die, then excavate cards from the top of your deck equal to the result, then add 1 excavated card with the declared name to your hand. If you did not add any card by this effect, you lose 2000 LP.

name: Pot of Fortune
text: Target 5 Spell/Trap Cards in your GY; shuffle all 5 into the Deck, then draw 2 cards. You cannot activate monster effects the turn you use this effect.

name: The One Called Forth
text: At the start of your Main Phase 1: Declare the name of 1 monster you do not control; for the rest of this turn, the activation of your cards and effects that include an effect that Summons a monster with that name cannot be negated, also your opponent cannot activate cards or effects when that monster is Summoned.

name: Pixie Bot
text: If you Link Summoned a monster this turn using a Normal Monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand to your zone a Link Monster points to. You can banish 1 Link Monster from your GY; Special Summon Normal Monsters from your GY up to the Link-Rating of the banished monster. You can only use each effect of "Pixie Bot" once per turn.

name: Chrono-Saur Raptor
text: If your opponent controls 2 or more monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Chrono-Saur" monster from your Deck to your hand. If this card is destroyed by card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Chrono-Saur" monster from your hand or GY, except "Chrono-Saur Raptor". You can only use each effect of "Chrono-Saur Raptor" once per turn.

name: Light Within the Crying Chaos
text: Add 1 Level 4 or lower "Crying Chaos" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can banish this card from your GY; take 1 Zombie Tuner monster from your GY or banishment and either add it to your hand or place it on the bottom of your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Light Within the Crying Chaos" once per turn.

name: A Throne of Crying Chaos
text: Target 2 Zombie monsters with the same Level that are banished: Special Summon them, but place them on the bottom of the deck when they leave the field. You can only activate 1 "A Throne of Crying Chaos" per turn.
